javadoc:
The docking application layout defines the customizable elements of a docking application's 
 directory structure.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new docking application layout object with the given name.

throws.comment: if there was a problem getting a user directory.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new docking application layout object with the given name and version.

throws.comment: if there was a problem getting a user directory.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructs a new docking application layout object with the given set of application
 properties.

params.name: applicationProperties
params.comment: The properties object that will be read system properties.

throws.comment: if there was a problem getting a user directory.

name: DockingApplicationLayout
comment:
The docking application layout defines the customizable elements of a docking application's 
 directory structure.
